meanings.sent1: I need to presort the mail before delivering it.
meanings.sent2: She always presorts her laundry before washing it.
meanings.sent3: The librarian decided to presort the books by genre, making it easier for readers to find what they want.
meanings.sent4: Before the big event, the team had to presort all the equipment to ensure a smooth setup.
meanings.sent5: Presorting the ingredients before cooking can save a lot of time in the kitchen.

meanings.sent1: The presort of the documents helped speed up the filing process.
meanings.sent2: We always do a presort of the recycling to make sure everything is separated correctly.
meanings.sent3: The presort of the puzzle pieces made it easier for the kids to start putting it together.
meanings.sent4: The presort of the packages at the post office ensured efficient delivery.
meanings.sent5: Doing a presort of the clothes before packing them for the trip saved space in the suitcase.
